description: The Women’s Slopestar Ski Pants are cut with a modern silhouette and built for riding the resort. A waterproof and breathable shell keeps you dry while sitting on wet chairlifts or in the snow strapping into your board before you drop in, and lightweight PrimaLoft® Black Insulation ECO makes sure you stay warm while cruising down the mountain. Smart extras like zippered leg vents help you cool off if the day warms up while internal gaiters keep snow out if you’re searching for pow in the trees, or falling a lot is on the agenda when you're learning to ski or snowboard. .
name: Slopestar Pants - Womens
